article.headline: Pepperdine 92, Long Beach State 86
article.story: MALIBU, Calif. (AP) -- Tashaan Forehan-Kelly had 23 points and 10 rebounds and Michael Gerrity added 21 points and six assists as Pepperdine beat Long Beach State 92-86 Saturday night. Pepperdine (2-6), which snapped a four-game losing streak, shot 52.2 percent (35-for-67) one game after shooting a season-low 29.2 percent in a loss at Colorado State. The Waves got 19 points from Willie Galick and 11 from Chase Griffin. Kevin Houston led Long Beach State (2-6), loser of four straight, with 19 points, while Jibril Hodges scored 18 points and Kejuan Johnson had 15. The 49ers never recovered from a dismal first half in which they shot just 33 percent (11 of 33) on the way to a 46-32 halftime deficit. Long Beach State, which shot 46.2 percent (30-for-65) for the game, gradually cut into Pepperdine's lead in the second half thanks to a bevy of 3-pointers. The 49ers were 8-for-14 from behind the arc in the second half and finished 11-for-26 for the game. Long Beach State got to within five, 83-78, on Houston's lay-up with 1:09 left but were forced to put Pepperdine at the line down the stretch. The Waves made five of eight free throws in the final minute to seal the win.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
